text: Nasrallah Boutros Sfeir (, ; 15 May 1920 â€“ 12 May 2019) was the patriarch of Lebanon's largest Christian body, the Maronite Church, an Eastern Catholic Church in communion with the Holy See. He was also a Cardinal. He was elected Patriarch of Antioch for the Maronites on 27 April 1986, and his resignation was accepted on 26 February 2011. Bechara Boutros al-Rahi became patriarch following the resignation. Sfeir was the third Maronite Cardinal and the 76th Patriarch of the Maronite Church with the official title of "His Beatitude and Eminence the seventy-sixth Patriarch of Antioch and the Whole Levant". Sfeir was born in Rayfoun. He died of a chest infection on 12 May 2019 in Beirut. He was 98. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * * His Beatitude and Eminence Patriarch Sfeir * Dossier: Nasrallah Boutros Sfeir * Patriarch Sfeir page on Catholic Hierarchy Category:1920 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory tract infection Category:Lebanese Christians Category:Maronites Category:Eastern Catholic bishops Category:Patriarchs
title: Nasrallah Boutros Sfeir
